description:
Wallet (shared/access_control/arbitrary_location_write_simple.sol#9-40) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- bonusCodes.push(c) (shared/access_control/arbitrary_location_write_simple.sol#22)

Wallet.PopBonusCode() (shared/access_control/arbitrary_location_write_simple.sol#25-29) contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- require(bool)(0 <= bonusCodes.length) (shared/access_control/arbitrary_location_write_simple.sol#27)
